channel.title: 317/474 Development Team. Born 2 PK
channel.description:
[u][s][b][size=12pt]Born 2 PK[/size][/b][/s][/u]
Intro : Although a lot of servers use the Exion source due to its no anti-leech, I plan on re-coding it and repositioning alot of things on the source along with adding extra features. Plans include moving the home, adding new void shop items such as party hats, bgs ect. We also plan to add a 'donate for reward' feature which would help fund the hosting ect. when we get the server rolling.
Future Updates May Include: Along with a 474 maybe a 508 - Needs a little work before release. Donations - donate for a reward. More items. New curses. And Much More.
Why I'm Doing this : I'm pretty basic at coding and would like experience, along with experience I want to have fun while doing it. Most servers which use the Exion source don't exactly edit much and I would like to create a fun, playful server.
What type of server would it be? The type of server it would be is a medium xp rate Economy/Pking server.
Our Staff Positions:
[OWNERS] Owner : James ( Me) Co Owner : Dylan
[ADMINS] Cmmunity Lead : Open Administrator : Open Administrator : Open
[CODERS] Server Developer : James (Me) Server Developer : Bob AKA Daniel :D Server Developer : Open
[CLIENT] Client Developer : Open
[GFX] Graphics Designer : Open
[WEBSITE/FORUMS] Website Developer : James (Me) Website Developer : Open
[color=blue][VPS HOSTING] VPS Operator: Closed - Sold Linux VPS buying a windows one.
If your going to ask for pictures just search the Exion source online, you guys must understand the project is early in development.
Dylan has bought us a Linux OS VPS which uses SSH client. If you have any experience with RSPS hosting on a Linux VPS then there is a position for VPS Operator.
To Apply For Any Staff Position Use This Application Below
Name : Proof Of Experience : Age : Msn/Skype : Why Do You Want To Be A Part Of The Development Team? Extra :
I'm available to contact over MSN @ lcpdclan@hotmail.co.uk or born2pk@live.co.uk
